amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used to declare a national monument with the use of the Antiquities Act in Montrose County, Colorado; Mesa County, Colorado; Monezuma County, Colorado; San Juan County, Colorado; or Dolores County, Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
